languages.text: "Здесь была великая сеча. Столько храбрых душ пало, что их гнев обрушил сами своды этого склепа!"

traits.locale_text: "Здесь была великая сеча. Столько храбрых душ пало, что их гнев обрушил сами своды этого склепа!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "There was a great reaping here. So many brave souls fell and their wrath brought down the very vaults of this tomb!"
languages.original_text: "Здесь была великая сеча. Столько храбрых душ пало, что их гнев обрушил сами своды этого склепа!"

traits.locale_text: "There was a great reaping here. So many brave souls fell and their wrath brought down the very vaults of this tomb!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There was a great reaping here. So many brave souls fell and their wrath brought down the very vaults of this tomb!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There was a great reaping here. So many brave souls fell and their wrath brought down the very vaults of this tomb!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There was a great reaping here. So many brave souls fell and their wrath brought down the very vaults of this tomb!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “这里发生过一场大屠杀。无数英勇的灵魂倒下了，他们的怒火冲塌了这座墓穴的拱顶！”
languages.original_text: "There was a great reaping here. So many brave souls fell and their wrath brought down the very vaults of this tomb!"

traits.locale_text: “这里发生过一场大屠杀。无数英勇的灵魂倒下了，他们的怒火冲塌了这座墓穴的拱顶！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Aquí ha tenido lugar una gran siega. ¡Muchas almas valientes cayeron y su ira derribó las mismas cámaras de esta tumba!».
languages.original_text: "There was a great reaping here. So many brave souls fell and their wrath brought down the very vaults of this tomb!"

traits.locale_text: «Aquí ha tenido lugar una gran siega. ¡Muchas almas valientes cayeron y su ira derribó las mismas cámaras de esta tumba!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「ここで大きな刈り取りがあった。多くの勇敢な魂が倒れ、その怒りがこの墓の天井を崩落させたのだ！」
languages.original_text: "There was a great reaping here. So many brave souls fell and their wrath brought down the very vaults of this tomb!"

traits.locale_text: 「ここで大きな刈り取りがあった。多くの勇敢な魂が倒れ、その怒りがこの墓の天井を崩落させたのだ！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Hier gab es eine große Ernte. So viele brave Seelen sind gefallen und ihr Zorn brachte die Gewölbe dieses Grabes zum Einsturz!"
languages.original_text: "There was a great reaping here. So many brave souls fell and their wrath brought down the very vaults of this tomb!"

traits.locale_text: "Hier gab es eine große Ernte. So viele brave Seelen sind gefallen und ihr Zorn brachte die Gewölbe dieses Grabes zum Einsturz!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Il y a eu une grande moisson ici. De nombreuses âmes vaillantes sont tombées, et dans leur fureur, elles ont fait s'effondrer jusqu'aux fondations de ce tombeau ! »
languages.original_text: "There was a great reaping here. So many brave souls fell and their wrath brought down the very vaults of this tomb!"

traits.locale_text: « Il y a eu une grande moisson ici. De nombreuses âmes vaillantes sont tombées, et dans leur fureur, elles ont fait s'effondrer jusqu'aux fondations de ce tombeau ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Burada büyük bir katliam gerçekleştirilmiş. Sayısız cesur kişi helak olmuş ve içlerindeki öfke bu kabrin mahzenlerine dâhi zarar vermiş!"
languages.original_text: "There was a great reaping here. So many brave souls fell and their wrath brought down the very vaults of this tomb!"
